CustomField.description: When checked, process builder will fire to create a new Amp Submission record which is copied from the SOS "Validation Compliance Check" template (ID stored in Custom Label Validation_Compliance_Check_Template_ID), which is then completed by PPC approver.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, a new Validation Compliance Check record is created for a PPC approver to complete, while the Project is locked for approval.
CustomField.label: Create Validation Compliance Submission
